synonyms: tina-daśāya—in three conditions; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; rahena—remains; sarva-kāla—at all times; antaḥ-daśā—internal condition; bāhya-daśā—external condition; ardha-bāhya—half-external consciousness; āra—and.
translation: The Lord remains in one of three different states of consciousness at all times: internal, external, and half-external.
